title: View Engine is deprecated
reason: Angular 9 introduced Ivy as the new default compiler and runtime
recommendation: Remove the 'enableIvy' option from your tsconfig.json file to enable Ivy by default

title: Removal of <ngForm>
reason: This was deprecated in Angular 6 and removed in Angular 9

title: Removal of 'CollectionChangeRecord' and 'DefaultIterableDiffer'
reason: These were deprecated in Angular 4 and removed in Angular 9

title: Removal of 'Renderer'
reason: This was deprecated in Angular 4 and removed in Angular 9

title: Removal of 'preserveWhitespaces' option
reason: This was deprecated in Angular 8 and removed in Angular 9
recommendation: Remove this option from your component decorators

title: Removal of 'entryComponents'
reason: With Ivy, this is no longer necessary

title: Removal of 'loadChildren' string syntax
reason: This was deprecated in Angular 8 and removed in Angular 9
recommendation: Use the import() syntax for lazy loading instead
